constantValues: Choose the subject for the case, such as catalog request or product complaint, so customer service managers can identify frequent requests or problem areas. Administrators can configure subjects under Business Management in the Settings area.

constantValues: Shows the case number for customer reference and searching capabilities. This cannot be modified.

members.description: Shows the case number for customer reference and searching capabilities. This cannot be modified.

constantValues: Choose the primary case the current case was merged into.

constantValues: Select a primary contact for this case.
